items.name: Sceptre X505BV-F 50" 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV
items.categoryPath: Electronics/TV & Video/Shop TVs by Type/LED TVs
items.shortDescription: <p>The stylish, glossy black Sceptre X505BV-F 50" LED 1080P HDTV with 60Hz offers a truly customizable viewing experience. This LED HDTV features a sleek and streamlined look that will lend an air of elegance to any room, with a sophisticated glossy black finish and swiveling screen. The 1080P LED display is composed of over 2 million pixels, delivering a vast array of vivid colors and rich, clear details, and the amazing automatic contrast enhancement helps balance images to look bolder and more lifelike. A 60Hz refresh rate lets you watch your favorite shows and movies flicker-free for an uninterrupted viewing experience. The Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL) transfers all of your thrilling multimedia entertainment (including movies, TV and music) from your MHL-enabled smart phone or tablet onto your TV screen. The Sceptre 50" HDTV also comes equipped with 3 HDMI ports that let you connect game systems and other devices with the convenience of a single cord.</p>
items.longDescription: <b>Note:</b> You must have a source of HD programming in order to take full advantage of the Sceptre X505BV-F 50" LED 1080P HDTV with 60Hz. Contact your local cable or satellite TV provider for details on how to upgrade.<p><br><b>Sceptre X505BV-F 50" 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV:</b></p><ul><li>50" LED panel<br>With a 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution</li><li>True 16:9 aspect ratio<br>View your movies as the director intended</li><li>Wide 176-degree vertical and 176-degree horizontal angles<br>See a clear picture from anywhere in the room</li><li>Built-in digital tuner ATSC/NTSC<br>Watch digital broadcasts, including HDTV programs where available</li><li>HDMI Inputs: 3<br>Enjoy a superior HD experience with HDMI, the one cable audio/video solution</li><li>50" screen measured diagonally from corner to corner</li><li>Wall mountable<br>VESA standard 200mm x 200mm</li></ul><br>TV stand sold separately. See all <b><a href="http://www.walmart.com/cp/133114" target="_blank">TV stands</a></b>.<br><br>TV mount sold separately. See all <b><a href="http://www.walmart.com/cp/581514">TV mounts</a></b>.<br><br><b>ENERGY STAR<sup>(R)</sup></b><br>Products that are ENERGY STAR-qualified prevent greenhouse gas emissions by meeting strict energy efficiency guidelines set by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency and the U.S. Department of Energy. The ENERGY STAR name and marks are registered marks owned by the U.S. government, as part of their energy efficiency and environmental activities.

Don't worry about backups, updates or synching your device — its done automatically! The Aspire One Cloudbook makes it easy to connect to the Web with the latest 802.11ac wireless technology providing up to three times faster speeds than traditional wireless technology. Moreover, Bluetooth 4.0 lets you wirelessly connect the laptop to Bluetooth-enabled devices like mobile phones, speakers and headphones for cable-free work and play. The stunning 14-inch HD widescreen LED-backlit display delivers an incredible viewing experience of videos, photos or work wherever you are. Also, with a 1-year subscription Office 365 Personal, you have the latest full versions of Office applications, such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote and Outlook

Chromebook starts up in seconds, so you can immediately start playing or working. Chromebook looks like a laptop and feels like a laptop, but differs from traditional computers as follows:Instead of Windows OS or Apple OS, Chromebook PCs run on Chrome OS, an operating system that features multiple layers of security, cloud storage and the most popular Google products built right in.Chromebook won't load and run traditional PC applications such as Microsoft Office or Skype. However, Chromebook uses Chrome-specific apps for everyday tasks. You'l

items.name: Brother Refurbished RLX2763 27-Stitch Full-Featured Sewing Machine
items.categoryPath: Party & Occasions/Crafts/Sewing/Sewing Machines
items.shortDescription: The Brother RLX2763 is perfect, even for beginner sewers, with a full range of features and a lightweight, portable design. Loaded with features, the Brother RLX2763 offers 27 built-in stitches, with 63 stitch functions. Included are blind hem, decorative and quilting stitches and an automatic, one-step buttonholer. Enjoy the versatility of the six included quick-change sewing presser feet: buttonhole, zipper, button sewing, zigzag, narrow hemmer and blind stitch feet. Plus, the built-in free arm allows you to easily sew hems on pants or shirt sleeves. It is designed for ease of use, the RLX2763 comes with a built-in easy needle threader, jam-resistant Quick-Set top drop-in bobbin and an automatic bobbin winding system. Getting started is easy, with an included instructional DVD and quick start guide. The RLX2763 includes bilingual English/Spanish instruction manual, 25-year limited warranty and free customer phone and online technical support for the life of the product.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Refurbished Brother RLX2763 27-Stitch Full-Featured Sewing Machine:</b><ul><li>Easy stitch selector dial</li><li>Built-in, easy threading system</li><li>Super-easy automatic bobbin winding system</li><li>Jam-resistant Quick-Set top drop-in bobbin</li><li>Brightly lit LED work area</li><li>Sewing features:<ul><li>27 unique built-in sewing stitches, including an automatic, one-step buttonhole, with 63 stitch functions</li><li>6 versatile, quick-change sewing presser feet: buttonhole foot, zipper foot, button sewing foot, zigzag foot, narrow hemmer foot, blind stitch foot</li><li>Free arm for sewing cuffs and sleeves</li></ul></li><li>Instructional and support features:<ul><li>Instructional DVD</li><li>English/Spanish operation manual</li><li>Free phone/online technical support for the life of the product</li><li>25-year limited warranty</li></ul></li><li>Included accessories:<ul><li>6 quick-change sewing presser feet: buttonhole foot, zipper foot, button sewing foot, zigzag foot, narrow hemmer foot, blind stitch foot</li><li>4 bobbins, 3-piece needle set, twin needle, oval screwdriver, extra spool pin, darning plate</li><li>Foot controller</li><li>Power cord</li><li>English/Spanish operation manual</li><li>Instructional DVD</li></ul></li></ul>
